name: Tiny Mall!
description:
A tycoon game where you can build your own mall and rack up an absolute fortune! Inspired by many other games of a similar genre.

I may update the game to patch bugs, but will probably only add to the game if people suggest updates.

Suggestions, Reported Bugs and Constructive Criticism are greatly appreciated.

I apologize in advance for the terrible artwork.

How To Play

  • Select a stall from the bottom row by clicking its icon, then tap an open space to place that store there. 
  • More expensive stores will reap more profit.
  • Having more stores increases your popularity, which gives you more money. 
  • Selling a store only gives you back half of what you paid for it.
  • Place more stores on different floors. You can traverse between floors with the up/down buttons on the side.
  • You need to purchase higher floors before you can travel to them them. Locked floors are indicated by a lock icon on the bar on the right.
  • Upgrade stores by selecting the upgrade tool and clicking a shop.
  • Selling upgraded shops does not give more money back.

Credits

Music: "Slower" and "Pleasant Porridge" by Kevin Macleod.
